articles.title: In pictures: America chooses Biden
articles.description: Joe Biden will be the 46th president of the United States, CNN projects, denying Donald Trump a second term in office. A victory in Biden's native Pennsylvania put the Democrat over the 270 electoral votes needed to secure the presidency.
articles.content:
President-elect Joe Biden is joined by family members after he gave a speech in Wilmington, Delaware, on Saturday, November 7.
Updated 11:00 PM ET, Sat November 7, 2020
